about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of microscopic creatures!

Before you lies a vast universe teeming with life! Thousands of planets with millions of inhabitants striving to become the head of the food chain. Choose one of these planets, create your creature and set off to conquer a new unknown world!

Help your creation evolve from an inconspicuous inhabitant of the microscopic depths into a bright and unique creature that can stand up for itself.

Use your imagination and create the most unusual creature! Show it to the world! Share it with your friends or by fighting other players online.

Game features:

- Take part in the evolution! Create unique creatures using a flexible customization system, dozens of different body parts and a lot of colors for them. Countless unique combinations!

- Choose one of the thousands of planets available for life, fight with its bizarre inhabitants and become the strongest of them!

- Develop your creatures in battles with real players around the world. Prove that your creation is invincible!

- Share your creations with friends and add their creatures to your game. Find the most unusual life form!

- Participate in theme parties and prove that your creature is the best!
